name: Morselish
description: A two-way english-morse code translator built in HTML CSS/SCSS and vanilla JS

name: booksearch
description: A UI for customers to be able to search for books using the Google Books API paired with React

name: TheFakeReal

name: CLI Message Board
description: A Java-based multithreaded Command Line Interface app replicating TCP and UDP interactions between clients and servers in a message-board environment

name: MineSweeper
description: A Command Line Interface replica of classic Minesweeper, built in Java
